items.question: How does the domain checker work?
items.answer: Our tool checks domain availability across multiple TLDs simultaneously using WHOIS data.

items.question: What TLDs are supported?
items.answer: We support all major TLDs including .com, .net, .org, and many more. You can also add custom TLDs.

items.question: Is the service free?
items.answer: Yes, our basic domain checking service is completely free to use.

items.question: How accurate are the results?
items.answer: We provide real-time results directly from WHOIS databases for maximum accuracy.

items.question: Can I check multiple domains at once?
items.answer: Yes, you can check a domain across multiple TLDs simultaneously.
